title: Kabaddi Set – Front Side Sublimation
short: Premium front-sublimated kabaddi jersey set for professional play.
description: Made with breathable polyester, this front-sublimated kabaddi set offers comfort and durability during intense matches.

title: Kabaddi Set – Double Side Sublimation
short: Double-sided sublimation for bold, long-lasting prints.
description: Perfect for clubs and teams. Full double-side sublimation for vibrant, lasting colors.

title: Kabaddi Set – Full Sublimation
short: Complete full-sublimation for a pro-grade look.
description: Top-tier kabaddi set designed for all-day comfort with full-coverage sublimation.

title: Mars Plain T-Shirt
short: High-quality plain T-shirt with soft stretch fabric.
description: Mars plain tees made with 100% cotton for comfort and perfect fit.

title: Plain T-Shirt (Classic)
short: Minimalist plain T-shirt for everyday wear.
description: Versatile, stylish, and made from breathable cotton for maximum comfort.

title: Single Side Printed T-Shirt
short: Stylish front-printed T-shirt for custom designs.
description: Perfect for events and branding — high-quality single-side print.

title: Double Side Printed T-Shirt
short: Full double-side design for a complete look.
description: Custom double-side prints for maximum visibility and impact.

title: Full Sublimation T-Shirt
short: Full-body sublimation with vivid color technology.
description: Advanced print process that embeds color directly into the fabric.

title: Mars Single Side Sublimation
description: Bold graphics and breathable comfort with Mars signature style.
